channel.title: Welcome Avaunt as a moderator on RadixTalk
channel.description:
I’m very happy to announce that @Avaunt , who runs the [Avaunt Staking](https://explorer.radixdlt.com/#/validators/rv1qdn4mwharah5c3w5sw4zfyagvkftrj47ruwatjfr6z2r7pmvk5uuu84j45v) validator and the most excellent [RadixDashboard.com](https://www.radixdashboard.com/) website, has joined as a moderator on the RadixTalk forum.
Avaunt is well known in the community for running the [Radix Validator AMA](https://t.me/RadixValidatorAMA) on Telegram as well as his presence on Telegram and Discord where provides support and insights to the Radix Community.

item.title: Welcome Avaunt as a moderator on RadixTalk
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
I’m very happy to announce that @Avaunt , who runs the Avaunt Staking validator and the most excellent RadixDashboard.com website, has joined as a moderator on the RadixTalk forum.

Avaunt is well known in the community for running the Radix Validator AMA on Telegram as well as his presence on Telegram and Discord where provides support and insights to the Radix Community.
